wiki.content: According to the Country Grammar Songfacts, the song's melody was taken from the playground song, "Roller Coaster". User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: According to the Country Grammar Songfacts, the song's melody was taken from the playground song, "Roller Coaster".
